# 防抖

触发事件后在规定时间内回调函数只执行一次，如果在规定时间内又触发了该事件，则会重新开始计算时间

  • 非立即执行版：事件触发->延时->执行回调函数，如果在延时中继续触发事件，则会重新进行延时，在延时结束后执行回调函数

    常见例子：input搜索框,客户输完过一会就会自动搜索

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
    <title>防抖</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <button id="button">点击防抖</button>
    <script>
      function debounce(fnc, delay) {
        let timer = null
        return function() {
          if (timer) clearTimeout(timer)
          timer = setTimeout(() => {
            fnc.apply(this, arguments)
          }, delay)
        }
      }
      function clickBtn(a) {
        console.log('防抖成功', a)
      }
      let debounceClick = debounce(clickBtn, 1000)
      document.getElementById('button').addEventListener('click', function() {
        debounceClick('dada')
      })
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
    1

  • 立即执行版：事件触发->执行回调函数->延时，如果在延时中继续触发事件，则会重新进行延时，在延时结束后并不会执行回调函数

    常见例子：就是对于按钮防点击.例如点赞,心标,收藏等有立即反馈的按钮

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
    <title>防抖立即执行</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <button id="button">点击防抖</button>
    <script>
      function debounce(fnc, delay, immediate) {
        let timer = null
        return function() {
          if (timer) clearTimeout(timer)
          if (immediate) {
            if (!timer) fnc.apply(this, arguments)
            timer = setTimeout(() => {
              timer = null
            }, delay)
          } else {
            timer = setTimeout(() => {
              fnc.apply(this, arguments)
            }, delay)
          }
        }
      }
      function clickBtn(a) {
        console.log('防抖成功', a)
      }
      let debounceClick = debounce(clickBtn, 1000, true)
      document.getElementById('button').addEventListener('click', function() {
        debounceClick('dada')
      })
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

# 节流

持续触发事件时，在规定时间内只能调用一次回调函数，如果在规定时间内再次触发了该事件，不做任何操作

  • 时间戳方式：通过闭包保存上一次的时间戳，然后与事件触发的时间戳比较，如果大于规定时间，则执行回调，否则就什么都不处理

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
    <title>节流1</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <button id="button">点击节流</button>
    <script>
      function throttle(fnc, delay) {
        let previous = 0
        return function() {
          let now = Date.now()
          if (now - previous > delay) {
            fnc.apply(this, arguments)
            previous = now
          }
        }
      }
      function clickBtn(a) {
        console.log('节流成功', a)
      }
      let throttleClick = throttle(clickBtn, 1000)
      document.getElementById('button').addEventListener('click', function() {
        throttleClick('dada')
      })
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
    1
    2
    3
    4
    5
    6
    7

  • 定时器方式：通过闭包保存上一次定时器状态，然后事件触发时，如果定时器为null，则设置新的定时器，到时间后执行回调函数，并将定时器置为null

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
    <title>节流2</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <button id="button">点击节流</button>
    <script>
      function throttle(fnc, delay) {
        let timer = null
        return function() {
          if (!timer) {
            timer = setTimeout(() => {
              timer = null
              fnc.apply(this, arguments)
            }, delay)
          }
        }
      }
      function clickBtn(a) {
        console.log('节流成功', a)
      }
      let throttleClick = throttle(clickBtn, 1000)
      document.getElementById('button').addEventListener('click', function() {
        throttleClick('dada')
      })
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
    1

  • 时间戳+定时器

    function throttle(fun, delay = 500) {
        let timer = null
        let previous = 0
        return function(args) {
          let now = Date.now()
          let remaining = delay - (now - previous) //距离规定时间,还剩多少时间
          let that = this
          let _args = args
          clearTimeout(timer) //清除之前设置的定时器
          if (remaining <= 0) {
            fun.apply(that, _args)
            previous = Date.now()
          } else {
            timer = setTimeout(function() {
              fun.apply(that, _args)
            }, remaining) //因为上面添加的clearTimeout.实际这个定时器只有最后一次才会执行
          }
        }
      }
    1
